# Mixed syntax

This file contains v1 and v2 version of comments.

<!-- MD-MAGIC-EXAMPLE:START (LOLZ) cool=true -->
nice 
<!-- MD-MAGIC-EXAMPLE:END (LOLZ)-->


<!-- MD-MAGIC-EXAMPLE:START (LOLZ:dope=rad)-->
nice rad
<!-- MD-MAGIC-EXAMPLE:END (LOLZ)-->


<!-- MD-MAGIC-EXAMPLE:START (LOLZ?boo=ghost)-->
nice 
<!-- MD-MAGIC-EXAMPLE:END (LOLZ)-->
